error.title: Error
location_blocked_message: Location access is blocked in your browser settings. To enable it:
legend.title: Air Quality Index (AQI)
legend.health_very_good: Air quality very good, no health risks
legend.activity_good: Physical activity and outdoor stays without restrictions
legend.health_moderate: Air acceptable, may pose risk to sensitive groups
legend.activity_moderate: Activity possible, but sensitive groups should be cautious
legend.health_sufficient: Pollution poses health risk, especially for sensitive groups
legend.activity_sufficient: Consider limiting outdoor activity, especially prolonged or intense
legend.activity_bad: Sick, elderly, pregnant women and children should avoid outdoors. Others should limit activity
legend.health_very_bad: Very strong pollution negatively affects health
legend.activity_very_bad: Risk groups must absolutely avoid outdoors. Others should minimize time outside
